bwwExcerpt: Other than providing a tour-de-force challenge for an actor, however, the point of this production escapes me. It sheds no fresh light on the drama...Some people believe that Cumming is an exceptional and magnetic artist. I think that Cumming is an all right actor, but a little bit of him goes a very long way. So for me, at least, watching Cumming doing a lot of crazy Shakespeare was not an edifying experience.
